“Everything begins in the clinic…” Since 2004, my team and I have been touching, treating and transforming skin at my Hollywood clinic. Every at-home product we create is born from an ingredient or clinic treatment that defied the impossible, delivering visible results fast.

Is this a day cream? I thought that retinol doesn't work during the day if it comes into contact with the sun? No, +Retinol Vitamin C Moisturizer should be used as instructed, PM only. What is the difference between this and +Retinol Vitamin C Serum? While both are excellent products, +Retinol Vitamin C Moisturizer offers moisturization properties not provided by the serum. The serum is an excellent option for individuals who have oily skin but still want the benefits of Retinol. I have never used +Retinol before. As a beginner, should I start with the moisturizer or serum? As a beginner to Retinol, we recommend using the +Retinol Vitamin C Moisturizer first. This product offers moisturizing benefits to combat the drying and flaking commonly seen when skin is newly adjusting to Retinol usage. Use product 1-2x a week. I have the +Retinol Vitamin C Serum. Do you use that under the moisturizer or are they separately used? More does not mean better. Retinol is a strong active that can also cause dryness and flaking of skin. We recommend alternating usage of these products, i.e. +Retinol Vitamin C Moisturizer on one evening and +Retinol Vitamin C Power Serum on another. Does it help for hyperpigmentation? Yes! Retinol and Vitamin C are well known actives with brightening benefits. Retinol helps to increase skin cell turnover which thereby results in a diminished appearance of discoloration and spots. Vitamin C works to brighten and even skin tone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This stuff is magical!
reviews.reviewText: I have always had pretty good skin, so I haven't experimented with products much. I have noticed lately, as I am nearing 40, that my skin wasn't looking so hot anymore. Just dull and dry, and, well, older. I've used Kate's face wash for a while, so I decided to check out her anti-aging stuff.I never thought I would pay this much for a face cream, but holy cow, is it worth every penny! I swear, my skin looks about 10 years younger, and I've only used it twice.It is a tad bit drying for me, so I am only using it 2x per week for now. The rest of the week I use a heavy duty moisturizing night cream. It's pretty incredible - I would recommend this product 100%!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seems to work as advertised
reviews.reviewText: I liked the lightness if it, absence of any strong scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It works. Use with caution.
reviews.reviewText: Didn't know to use it every other night and only use it for a few times then take a break. Had to go on Kate Somervill website to find out more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Powerful face cream but risky for sensitive skin.
reviews.reviewText: This is a powerful face cream but risky for people who have sensitive skin. It was labeled as "Transformative Turnaround Cream." My experience is to avoid combining it with other skin care products to ensure the ingredients of other products won't interfere with the effectiveness of the ingredients of this cream.Something important found on the Kate Somerville website:#How to usePM Only.Apply a thin, even layer to face and neck.Reduce the frequency of use if sensitivity occurs. While using this product, also use a daily sunscreen. Do not combine multiple retinol products in the same application.#Full Ingredients ListAqua/Water/Eau, Neopentyl Glycol Diheptanoate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Propanediol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cocoglycerides, Cetyl Esters, Parfum/Fragrance, Stearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Dimethicone, Tridecyl Neopentanoate, PPG-26-Buteth-26, Glycerin, Bis-Stearyl Dimethicone, Retinol, Ascorbic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Panthenol, Physalis Angulata Extract, Volcanic Soil, Tocopherol, Adenosine, Hyaluronic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Amylopectin, PEG-40 Stearate, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, 1,2-Hexanediol, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Polysorbate 20, Ceteareth-20, Polysilicone-11, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Arachidyl Alcohol, T-butyl Alcohol, BHA, Citric Acid, Disodium EDTA, Cetyl Alcohol, BHT, Linalool, Limonene
